title: Ep 428 | Jase Loses an Ice Chest on the Highway & Phil Warns Against Idolatry
description:
Jase shares a very funny story about his ice chest falling out of his truck bed on the freeway. Al recalls miscalculating a road trip by a great distance. Jase reminds people that we rely on God's faithfulness instead of ourselves so that we do not have to carry the burdens of worry. Phil defines idolatry and warns against the ways we may worship an idol without realizing it. Jase reviews the way people who witnessed miracles still struggle with faith, and Phil gives Miss Kay's quail sandwiches high marks!

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
